about.subtitle: Our ethos, markets served, and what makes us different. We specialize in luxury properties across Mallorca's most desirable locations, offering unparalleled expertise and personalized service to discerning clients worldwide.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to redefine luxury real estate in Mallorca, Lion Capital Real Estate has grown from a boutique agency to one of the island's most trusted names in premium property services.
story.paragraph2: Our journey began with a simple belief: that exceptional properties deserve exceptional service. This philosophy has guided us through every transaction, every client relationship, and every milestone in our company's evolution.
story.paragraph3: Today, we continue to set new standards in the industry, combining traditional values of trust and discretion with innovative marketing strategies and cutting-edge technology.

step1.title: Property Review & Pricing Strategy
step1.description: We analyse your property and provide a clear, data-driven recommendation based on market demand and buyer trends.

step4.title: Viewings, Negotiation & Closing
step4.description: We handle viewings discreetly, negotiate on your behalf and coordinate the legal process through completion.
